mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clazz ( name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id, subject, update_Time, create_Time ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{room}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{masterId}, #{subject}, #{updateTime}, #{createTime} )
mapper.delete: delete from clazz where id in (#{id});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM clazz WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
